text: Graffiti is a nuisance and the owner of the property on which the graffiti is located shall abate the graffiti or authorize the Mayor to abate the graffiti as provided for in § 42-3141.03.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 3 of Anti-Graffiti Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-389, May 5, 2010, 57 DCR 4332).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-219, see notes following § 42-3141.01.

DC CODE § 42-3141.02

Current through December 11, 2012
